content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside my house, staring up at the stars. i noticed 1 in particular that had kind of a gold color to it.  it began to move, a little slower than a satellite does, but not by much. i thought that was weird, and then it stopped and faded out slowly and looked like it moved up/away because it got smaller as it faded. it's not the first time i've seen odd things in the sky here, and by no means the most interesting. this is just the first time reporting one.
content.summary: Object was stationary. began to move in straight path. stopped, disappeared /faded  up.

content.detailedDescription: It was the last saturday in march me and my girlfriend stepped outside our front door to smoke we had a baby in the house it was 2:05 am all the sudden my girlfreind said whats that she ponted up it was a clear cool night i finaly saw what she seen it looked like a small dull whight cone shapped objeck coming straight down from the stars suddenly made a sharp turn hedding north west and it made a slight turn strait west at that moment its shape was a huge v  made of seven very bright lights it was imense it left no trails and was absolutly silent the hair  was standig up on my arms me and my girlfreind were very disturbed by this it went from a tiny dot up in the stars to giant v shape on earth in only 15 seconds my girlfreind made me go inside the house and lock all the doors  i had the feeling it knew we were watching it i cant explain looked like it travaled thousands of miles in seconds there is air trafic   center in our town have always wondered if it showed up on there radar it wasnt from here and i will never forget it. i saw its giant vshape to the west and then im not sure if it turned again but suddenly t it was incredible thay are real i have only told small number of people and my girlfreind doesnt whant to talk about any more she was deeply impacted by this event it was real
content.summary: Cone shap coming strait down from stars change oudiraction nw and made a giant v shape

content.detailedDescription: when i was about nine years old me and my mom had a white ball fall us around  we moved out of site it  followed us   for about 30 minutes  then just disappeared  then about a  year later i went out the back door and there was a big  orange ball of light  it lit up the whole backyard threefold us seen it my  brother  steve  ricks  college  it lasted about 10 minutes then it just  vanished  there was cattle mutilation happen about that time
content.summary: That big bright orange ball

content.detailedDescription:
I had what i thought was a dream, but i still remember every detail vividly. i was laying on what seemed like a hospital bed and these beings that had the bluest eyes i have ever seen were looking into my eyes and i felt so comforted.  one of them ( there were about 5 of these beings ) had a hand on my forehead and i could feel nothing, but they had very blue eyes.
i knew that they were poking and prodding me all over but i did not feel any pain.  it was like i was in a hypnotic state where i could not move and i knew i was being examined, but their blue eyes looking into my eyes and the hand on my forehead gave me comfort.  
they did look human and they seemed to have compassion for me.  i have only told one other person about this because of fear of being laughed at. i have had other experiences since the age of 4.
content.summary: I was on a hospital bed and in an operating theater so i do not really have a discription of the craft

content.detailedDescription: In blanchard ok 1963 sleeping in front yard with neighbor boy who lived across the street.Just 2 boys laying in front yard looked up seen large object with red green yellow flashing lights with no sound just moving very slowly right above water tower in town ,watched it just move slowly across the sky till it was out of sight. it was 55 yrs ago can still show you the yard where i was sleeping ,still remember it like it was yesterday.After it was out of sight he got up went home i went into the house.Have maybe told 5 people in my life about it.I know it was real have had the same memory my whole life.
content.summary: 5 yr old sleeping in front yard with neighbor

content.detailedDescription:
I was thirteen years old at the time. my mom, sister and i had just gotten home from a late movie. the time was almost one o'clock in the morning. we lived in an apartment in a large secluded area with lots of horses and dogs. as we were pulling into the property there was a flash of blinding white light. so bright we could see nothing else. it only lasted a couple of seconds then stopped. we all looked at eachother and said that was really weird. thinking nothing more we then went inside where i grabbed a can of dog food to feed our dog kennelled outside. as i was walking down the dirt road i could hear the dogs barking like they wanted to get out and get something. as i approached the kennels i saw a figure run across across the road. it made me jump so bad i dropped the can of dog food. as it ran into the trees i could see it wasn't an animal or a human. it about four feet tall with smokey blue skin. everything happened so fast i couldn't make heads or tails of what just happened. i was so scared by it that i ran and threw the dog food in the kennel, with the dogs still freaking out and barking, and ran all the way back up the road home. i told my mom who was surprised by what i had just told her, she said it was weird that we had just seen the bright flash too. not knowing what to think or do we just locked the door and watched tv. 
two weeks later my mom, sister and i were walking our dog just after nine o'clock. it was dark and suddenly our dog bolts for something in the distance out of sight. she was on a leash so she couldn't get far. once again we saw the same blueish human like thing running out of sight again. we were shocked and rushed home. about two weeks after those encounters we were coming home from another late movie. as we drove into the property we saw the same flash of blinding light and again it only lasted a couple of seconds. after that we haven't had another encounter.
content.summary: A blinding white light and multiple sightings of an alien entity

content.detailedDescription: I was fourteen years old and fishing at a secluded lake in the woods with my father and a family friend. the friend said, "look a shooting star" and then walked away. i stood there and witnessed what appeared to be a shooting star, a white burning streak shooting across the sky. then it descended toward me and started to slow down. it now had a glowing orange look and totally silent. it stopped just over the tree line surrounding the lake and hovered for a couple of seconds then slowly moved in a straight line to my left and vanished over the trees....Did not vanish in thin air, but as it proceeded to move to my left i could not see it any more because of the trees.  i loved fishing at the time but just saw something i could not explain so i went back to our car and told my father i wanted to leave the area.  i am and ex airline pilot and not 75 years old but that is something i will never forget.
content.summary: Glowing orange globe

content.detailedDescription:
The dates and time are my best guesses. somewhere around 1980, summer time, in early evening my wife, brother, his wife and i were driving down highway 1 in pacifica in a southbound direction. as highway 1 is on the ocean we looked out to sea and saw a bright blue light in the form a straight line to the horizon both north and south moving from the west to east. we were in a car so we hurried to our home which was on a hill about a half mile away but was in the path of the light which seemed to move very slowly (maybe about 10 mph). upon reaching my home before the light got there my brother and i got out of the car and waited a minute or so until it reached us. the lighted line was solid and appeared to be about one foot in  width and about the same in height or thickness. it was right on the surface of the ground and traveled along the contours of the earth like it was a bar code reader. it went right over and through us and continued eastward until it was out of sight. we called the police and reported it and they said that others had called also. there were no visible aircraft of any kind that we could see. as the line was first noticed over the ocean we could see that it was a straight line as far as we could see both to the north and to the south over the water. we felt nothing when it went over us. the color was only blue like the color blue in the writing above this box on your website. it may have been a little lighter but was very obvious.
also, i spoke to someone at mufon about this years ago but wanted to put it in writing. i read and was told that this event has been reported about every 50 years for at least a couple hundred years.
content.summary: Blue light in sky in straight line looked like a bar code reader

content.detailedDescription:
i were driving south on highway 14 about 6 miles south of santa fe  i looked up to enjoy the clear blue sky and i noticed a shiny object moving. its chromo-like surface has one reflection from sun. not multiple reflections like aluminun foil. the sun reflection glides across the ovject's surface. i first assume it would be a weather ballon.  however, something tells me its not balloon. it seems to turn gently and change its direction. i looked down to the road and wonder if truck in front of me also saw it. i lookd up again and it gave me one last flash of sun reflection before disappearing into the sky. i wore a polarized sunglasses and scaned all over the sky and the object did not reappear. 
   i am intrigued by strange objects in the sky especially this one.  i once saw a military plane that goes super fast with pulse engine.  it was one of most amazing thing i ever seen in my backyard. i believe that was aurora.  its the same sky where i saw the shiny object.  i also seen plenty of weather ballon and meteorites. i was disappointed that this merallic object vanished suddenly as i am itching curious to see what it was.  the sighting last for few minutes.  i experienced no mood changes or anything except for disappointment.
content.summary: Non dramatic sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
I remember the event clearly. it was fourth of july weekend, 2008. i had stepped away from our group, and went outside. after a few minutes, i noticed the lights, it was just after sunset, and while there were a few stars in the sky, these stood out to me, but i wasn't sure why.

as i stood, watching them i found myself mesmerized (not unusually so) at the movement they were making. the brightness and intensity of the lights could have been easily equated to a star.  there was nothing 'unusual' about the movement, they just seemed to be getting closer, and the 3 points of light seemed to be 'disconnected' . . . meaning the lights remind me of the common 'triangle lights' that are seen with sightings, only the 3 points that i saw were not connected physically.

someone at the party stepped out and asked me to come inside. i called him by name, and asked him to take a look at the lights & tell me what he thought. he took an incredibly brief look and said, "they're stars", and began to head inside & waved me into the house. i said, "they're getting closer". he paused for a second, looked directly at them, and validated my claim, adding that it was very disturbing and strange, and encouraged me, once again, to go inside.

as much as i wanted to remain, i heeded his concerns (and accepted the dismissal of the event) and after a few moments, went inside.

i could add a bit more about their movement, how they/it seemed to be so close. i recently had another event with "light /shadow" which would help me to explain a bit more in detail about what i think was happening.

special note: have worked with high tech parts that may be used for an em cloak.
content.summary: 3 lights appeared to be separating and somehow 'united in purpose'. they continually got closer, i called a friend who also observed 3 lights.

content.detailedDescription: My sister was sick i thought i may get to her house up in the mountains and have to take her to the hospital. it was around 9:30 pm that i got there i assessed how she was and made her a cup of tea and soup. as i handed it to her i heard a noise it's about 10:00 or almost 10:30 pm. i asked her do you hear that noise so she stopped eating then i said is it the water pipes or the hot water heater it was a warm nite so no heat was on. she said no she had never heard that sound befor i asked her do you hear it behind me pointing to the back of the house. she was pointing to the front of the house then it got louder i am an electrical tech i have worked with a lot of electrical sounding machines i have worked on trains planes autos this was an electrical undulating sound. after my sister said it was in the front it got louder i looked at her and said no and i pointed above us. i told her its above us she wanted me to go outside to look but i am like i am not getting beamed up so i didn't move then dead silence. still to this day i tell my sister i was glad she was sick maybe that's why they didn't bother with us. this sound i will never forget i know electrical sounds but that wasn't anything i ever heard i have to say that after that i didn't spend the night too many times after that. my sister and i don't live there any longer she is in arizona and i am in california not because of that nite but we are both in towns with people and street lights not like back home.
content.summary: It was a undulating electrical sound  it lasted at least for two to three min

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, seriously, if you're going to put everything into a box like you have, you will never hear all of the stories.  i just willy nilly filled in all the required fields, none of them applied to my story.

i don't know the date.  i was nine or ten.  in temple city, california, there was a several month period of time where rocks were "thrown" at a house.  four police departments, a psychic and who knows who else were involved in investigating it.  my family was friends with that family and we were in it every bit as much as they were.  we were there every night for months.  rocks no one could ever explain.  a cop told my mom once that he thought it was a "poltergeist".  i think it was something else.

was wondering if there are any other reports of things like this happening.  i know the story was in the pasadena star, i have the article, can send it.  "mystery rocks" was the title i think.

look, i love your show but i'm no nut.  once, when i was a kid, i had an experience that i still can't believe happened. so i'm writing to you to see if maybe you've had other stories like this.

the name of the people at the house were donna and jim siry.  they had  daughters tammy, monique and a son named sam.  

i'd like some closure on this.  the story is real.
content.summary: Mystery rocks

content.detailedDescription:
The year was 1965. i was a small child living about 3 miles from goodfellow airforce base in san angelo, texas. the base on occassions would have air shows and we would sit on the back porch and watch the planes fly over. i was a small child but knew the names of all the planes. the day before my sighting they had held an airshow. it was hot,clear day and i was laying on the back porch up under the shade of the roof staring out across the sky. their are no tall trees just low growing mesquite trees and grass as far as you could see. i watched a small dot the size of a pencil tip grow bigger and bigger cruising over the top of the brush straight toward me. it stopped right above the house where i was laying in the shade and was as big as my house. maybe 40 ft across it hovered about 100 feet above the ground right over one of the only telephone poles there. the object was disc shaped with a small dome over it. it was brown in color and what has always stayed with me is the texture. it had the texture of an oatmeal cookie but was so smooth and seamless and looked so hard. it had no windows. it was a beautifully crafted machine.
 my father being a mechanic i knew that metal did not just hover in the air silently making no sound. i was mesmerized, in awe,shocked and so scared i froze for a short time just staring at it. i don't think it saw me because when i finally caught my breath i screamed "mom" who was about 10 feet inside the house doing dishes. the craft shot straight up and disappeared in seconds. it took my mother only seconds to respond to my scream and by the time she threw open the door and saw what i was pointing up to, the object went from a 40 ft object to the size of a small dinner plate and disappeared. it was as if i scared it. my mother saw it but did not see the size of the craft that i saw. she told me not to talk about it. i didn't for years but i am glad to know that i am not the only person who has had this kind of experience. i have not spent my life never looking up that's for sure.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Broad day light. .Watchef a small dot get closer until it was huge right above me. silemt disc shape

content.detailedDescription: My friend was spending the night at my house. we would sneak outside at night a lot to walk around town. this is a small town in maine so we would be the only people outside at 1 a.M..  we went out about 1 a.M. on this night and while we were still on my street,  a small dead end road in the woods with no lights next to a river, we could hear the ice breaking on the river. at first we weren't alarmed by it. then it got louder and louder. finally to the point we got scared not knowing what it was so we turned around and started running back to my house. the loud noise of the ice breaking seemed to follow us as we ran. then suddenly the noise stopped and just then we saw a disk shaped ufo come from that direction flying across the woods and the road and then right over my house at tree top level. it made no sound while flying. it looked like a disk with a dome. there were lights spinning all around the disk. the lights almost seemed like an aura. many different colors all meshed together. it was moving very slow and kept moving until it was out of site. i have seen 2 others near my house after this. one was a triangle shapped one that seemed to fly right for me. it hovered right over me. it was tje size of a huge building. my dad also saw a disk shapped one at night outside our house. lots of strange things happened there at that house. my mom has seen lights or orbs in the house at night and i've seen figures outside the windows and doors at night. one was in the front door at about 3 a.M. . it was holding the screen door open and seemed like it was almost 8 feet tall. i couldn't see what it was. it just looked like a shadowy figure.
content.summary: My friend and i were outside and herd the ice breaking on the river. when the noise stopped,  the ufo appeared

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out in my front yard at about 10 pm looking at the stars in northern california 1500 ft elevatiom in the mountains. being able to see so many stars i always try to see something stand out when this bright light bigger and brighter than any star out came fly out from behind a mountain ne of me. it proceeded e going up and down back and forth(front and backward) when all of a sudden 8 to 10 helicopters and planes appeared behind it trying to fallow it it seemed. though the 8 to 10 small dots that were blinking red lights like usual planes at night couldn't keep up with the object in front of them. then after a few minutes the big solid light disappeared behind another mountain just like the planes did. this is a united states air force base in the same direction my siting happened. therefore making me belive that there really was something worth chasing i'm the sky that night.
content.summary: Wondering what the military was chasing.

content.detailedDescription: I was 5 years old and was staying overnight at my sisters house. i had gone to bed in the living room floor lying on the floor when i was awaken or just woke up and i saw this thing coming at me from behind my head.The thing was it look like it was crawling but it had a big needle in front of it. i couldn't tell if it was crawling or walking but it was very short.I was petrified but the one thing that i noticed was that i could not move, i was literally paralyzed. i kept thinking it was a dream even though i could not move i could not move a muscle and i watch the needle coming toward my head. i still thought it was a dream but the only movement i could make was the tilt my head backwards watching it come toward me and i saw the needle pointing toward the top of my forehead and then i felt it penetrate the top of my forehead.Still thinking this was a dream the pain was excruciating and scared me to death.I felt the needle penetrating my foreheadat which point i believed this had to be realbut i was powerless to move.At this point i jumped up nobody was there i was screaming and ran into my sister's bedroom telling her what i saw of which she told me to go back to bed that it was just a dream and i will describe what i saw.Remember i was only five and i knew nothing of ufosand the only way i could describe what i saw was a game that i used to play which was a game called cooties. it had huge pure black eyes elongatedand i remember it was short. it wasn't until i was a teenager and i saw an article about the hill encounter then i realized what i saw was exactly what they saw. i felt the needle penetrate my headbut again i had nothing to related to except for the game kudi until i saw the encounter by the hills.I am now 65 years old and what still astounds me is the fact that i felt that needle go into my forehead the top of my forehead which is what scared me the most and i was paralyzed i could not move. i never told anybody about it because i didn't know what i saw i dunno what i felt but as my sister said it was only a dream to this day i do not believe it was a dream.There was intense pain and i could not movei felt the needle penetrate i felt it penetrate into the top of my forehead.I have had one other encounter many many many years later but nothing related to thisbut i can talk to you about that at another time
content.summary: Was numb-had needle thrust into upper forehead

content.detailedDescription: I was about 9 years old when i seen a u.F.O. it was the summer of 1985, and i was playing with my brother who was 8 years of age at the time. it was a hot summer day just like many other salinas summers. the sky was clear and bright. i remember feeling a strange feeling come over me like something was not right. i looked up out my window, we were on the second story of the apt. we lived in. directly across the street was a 7-11. i seen an object that resembled the planet saturn hovering above the roof of the store. it flew in an erratic figure8 and was glowing a very beautiful array of colors.Thier was a ring that circled the spherical body of the glowing u.F.O. between the glowing of light, you could see the sphere was a chrome metallic in color. i went out to our front porch and opened the door and observed the object. me and my brother were home alone and we were told to never go outside without supervision. but we did anyway and we could see the object hovering and heard an electrical humming or whirring.The obect left a kind of heat wave and aura around it. it stayed hovering in a figure 8 for a good five to ten minutes. then all of a sudden it did an abrupt change in direction ant took of in a degree of flight no man made craft could do. it was silent and was gone almost instantaneously. ive never seen anything accelerate that fast ever and without any sound. me and my brother sat shocked at what we seen. we were .Ot supposed to be outside so we went back in our apt. without questioning anyone else if they witnessed what we seen. when my parents got home we told our parents what we seen. my father believed us and my mother was kind skeptic til my father told her and me and my brother about his experiences while stationed in germany in the 70's while in the army. he had seen a bunch of u.F.O's while there and was told to never mention what he seen. but he told us that night and i knew we were not alone in this universe.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A hovering craft small in size that resembled the palnet saturn flying above 7-11 convenience store across from my apartment.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a young child when i experienced this, i was not a very imaginative child and did not make things up or exaggerate. i can't tell you the exact year except that it had to be in the mid to late 1970's and the time was anywhere from 10 p.M. to 11 p.M. i was supposed to be in bed asleep but, i tossed and turned and could not go to sleep, so i got out of bed and went over to my window to look out. what i saw has stayed with me all these years, it may not sound like anything to some people but for me it totally astounded me! my bedroom was on the main floor of the house and out my window i could see our backyard, the alley and the yard and house behind us as well as a good view of their front yard tree. in that tree i saw orbs that were solid and varied in color, they did not change color but this tree was full of them and they were zipping about the tree and the speed at which they were going around this tree was amazing. this went on for a few minutes and i was totally mesmerized and when it all ended i think they just vanished. i know this was not some laser light because they were solid. 
the next day, i went into the ally to see if i could find anything that may explain what i had seen the night before(i was just a kid so to me this made sense)..I found four or five odd looking "rocks". i still have them to this day and throughout my life i have asked many people to look at them and tell me what kind of rocks they are but no one can! they are white, smooth like glass and when i took an axe to one i just scratched it (it wouldn't even chip or crack) and it looked like some sort of metal but when we ran a metal detector over it, it did not pick it up. 
like i said i know some people will probably have an explanation for this experience, but for me it is something i will never forget.
content.summary: They were bright orb like, each was a different, solid color. i have never seen anything like them before or since!

content.detailedDescription: Was watering my front lawn was just getting dark and coming over my house at least 500 feet above me was this v shaped ship or ufo the thing was at least three to four houses wide but made absolutely no sound i just stood there stareing couldn't believe what i was seeing was going from west to east heading to the mountains was going toward about 40 to 50 mph like i said slow and no sound there is nothing i know of that can do that on that scale nothing was reported to news or nothing i have told some ppl but they said i was on drugs making things up that's bullshit i know what i saw it wasn't from this world
content.summary: Was moving slow no sound and three red lights not blinking and seemed to match the drak sky color barely can make out the shape

content.detailedDescription: I have submitted this both on here and to local mufon rep. no one ever got back to me but i promised a guy a would try again. my story is of mostly frustration. looking for years to see it again any where pics of others story's of others . it made me doubt my self but every time doubt loomed it comes back to one thing seeing is believing you can't undo what you see even if you want to. i was 8 we were at my dads moms for mothers day the day came to and endand my parents had sent me and my brother to the car as they finished up good byes with all the family members that had attended. i still remember why i seen it. i open the door to backseat and my brother pushed me backwards and jumped in fast as little brothers often do. that push changed my life. it caused me to look behind us. there was the story you want. but if you really want it contact me . i seen it i know what i saw weather you care or not remains to be seen. hope to hear from you
content.summary: Flew right over me at a blimp speed then fanished. very close a could make out a lot .

content.detailedDescription: i was only about 10 yrs. old and it was about 40 yrs. ago, but i remember it vividly. i was sitting on a hill, in the back lot of my friends yard in the middle of the afternoon. when i saw a bright ball of light coming out of what i think was the south. i thought it was a reflection off of a jet, but, it moved to the north across the sky in a straight line way too quickly to be a jet and it didn't make a sound. it also changed shape. sort of pulsating. i don't know if it was the reflection of the sun or if it was actually pulsating. i lost sight of the object over the horizon. i don't think i told anybody. i don't know how i felt except amazed.
content.summary: A ball of light moving across the sky much faster than any jet and without a sound

content.detailedDescription:
Hello mufon,

i was on the patio of my friends parents in homer, alaska after snowmobiling in late march of 1987.  i watched a satellite type object move in a pattern that would suggest it was mapping the area at what i would guess to be 10-20 miles above the earths surface.  i watched this object for about 5 minutes before getting my friend and his mother to look at what i was seeing. we watched this object another 10 minutes in amazement.  this observation has changed my life in more ways than i care to admit.  i have a weird connection with easter, and on easter day approximately 8 years ago i had a almost epiphany that allowed me to understood how ufo's travel at the speed's they do.  it led me to write a paper which i titled "the theory of gravity and magnetic energy and their relationship to cooling matter."

i won't go into detail here, but i was married to a ukrainian women who took the idea and sold it to a physicist named oleg lebedev that worked at the glk propulsion laboratory in fort myers, florida.  when i reported her to ice i was later visited by the state department and they told me i had to register ideas like this with them. i realized at this time how my theory was possibly spot on.  i sent a detailed outline of the theory to a woman in the security department at nasa named patti stockton.  i figured she would be as safe as any to send it too.  i wanted to help the usa, but now fear i should have kept the idea to myself.  

i will leave it at this for now as i'm not sure what to expect nor do i want to go into further detail at this time.  

judd walker
content.summary: Viewed satellite type object appear to grid area, then leave slight tracer and gone

content.detailedDescription:
I was working the midnight shift on a gov. installation. security work. my partner and i were on a routine patrol of the perimeter fence line of the installation.
we had stopped to observe a northern section of the fence line. i noticed a dim light in the distance, that seemed to be above the ground level and tree line. so we stayed in the vehicle and observed the light configuration as it grew nearer to our position.
it was a dark moonless night, and you couldn't see your hand in front of your face. 
the one light that we first observed had gotten larger, and it was soon apparent that the craft had a glowing globe on each of its corners.
as the craft continued to approach, the air seemed to get muggy and hard to breath. it was like a dead air situation.
the craft just kept getting larger and larger, as it approached our position. it seemed like a long time had passed when it finally reached the fence line where we were.
the size of that thing was huge, it was at least 300 to 350 ft. in length and at least 125 to 150 ft. wide on the tail end of its triangle shape.
the top of the craft was not dome shaped, but it looked like it was a raised structure with portals along its sides, like the port holes in the side of a sailing ship. they were dimly lit and in a neat row close to the mid line of the craft.
the bottom of the craft was like a giant convex mirror. every thing that it passed over was reflected in it like it was high noon on a bright sunny day. i could even see my own reflection along with my partner and the patrol truck in it. and there was no light reflected back from its surface to the   surrounding area.
the craft was moving at a snails pace of about 5 to 7 miles an hour.
if i would have climbed into the bed of the patrol truck, i could have reached up and touched the craft with my hands.
the craft drifted over the tree line to our south of our position and we lost sight of it. since the craft was moving at such a slow rate, we got back into the truck and moved for a better vantage point to see it egress the area. but when we had moved only about 100 yards to the next clearing, or vantage point the craft had vanished.
when i reported this incident to my boss, i was told not to repeat it to anyone. he told me that he had seen it to. and hinted to me that if i knew what was good for my job, i didn't see what i saw. and if i where ask by any one about the situation, i was to tell them that all i had seen was a low flying air craft with engine trouble.
when i told him that i knew just what i saw, i also told him that i was a licensed pilot, certified by the faa, and that was no aircraft that was from this earth, he told me to just keep my mouth shut and get out of his office.
i can supply additional information in the form of a hand drawn sketch but i'll have to send it snail mail. i have no way to upload it into my computer.
the other witness to this sighting, to this day, still refuses to acknowledge any truth to this event for fear of public ridicule.
content.summary: It was huge, an elongnated triangle shape craft.

content.detailedDescription: I had just completed a night jump with the 82d airborne division out of ft. bragg, nc on sicily drop zone.  after we landed, we had "admin" time to turn in our parachutes at a central turn in point.  once our parachutes were turned in, we went back into "tactical" mode and i joined my platoon securing our sector of the drop zone.  while lying in my position, scanning the perimeter, i looked up on the horizon to my north.  i saw what i thought was a satellite crossing the sky at very high altitude. (as a side note, i spent my last 2 years of high school in a rural town in texas prior to joining the military.  the reason i thought it was a satellite is because we used to be able to watch satellites almost nightly in our area.  there was no light pollution out in the sticks where we lived.  the speed of the object i observed that night was the same speed, or appeared to be, as the satellites i used to watch in texas).  i watched the "satellite" for about 20 seconds, when it suddenly made about a 45 degree angle "turn" and streaked off into the sky.  i was able to track it for about 3 seconds after the abrupt "turn".  that was no satellite that i know of, and even an sr-71 couldn't make a turn like that, nor streak out of the atmosphere.
content.summary: Light that made high speed 45 degree turn and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were driving back to oregon from southern california when we decided to stop at a rest stop in willows california. i got out went to the restroom and when i got back kym looked terrified and she said look over at the car next to us an see if you can see the persons face as i was looking at this person who was looked like he was hiding his face although i couldn't see the face i could see it's head and it was clearly to large to be real. as i was trying to get a look at this persons face i got a real uneasy feeling that i did not want to see what was behind the news paper and at that moment kym asked if i would take over driving. when kym ask me to drive i know there was a problem and a big one at that because kym never let anyone drive here car not even me for as long as we have been together (i'm noting this because it was so far out of character for her) so i hope on the freeway and headed towards oregon on i-5n i reminder going through redding ca and seeing the sign for shasta lake the next thing i remember was waking up behind the wheel and the first thing i said was this is the 3rd time we've been around this mountain only to have kym say we've lost 3 plus hours since seeing the sign for shasta lake. this is where things got way out of control kym started freaking out saying we had been abducted not only that she pointed out a scare that she said she did not have 4 hours prior to this adventure. i searched my body and found a scare down by my right ankle toward the back that was not there hours ago. i continued to drive as i was trying to make sense of what was going on, as kym starts  telling me that we our going to die tonight i've seen it happen. i tried to calm her down telling her there is a rational explanation for what we were experiencing so she goes on to tell me that she can prove it to me as she tell me exactly what vehicle is behind us along with the occupants of the vehicle. she continued to predict with a 100% accuracy every vehicle and person as i continued driving i got off the freeway to get some gas and as i'm driving down this road that was somewhere off north weed exit i pulled up to a shack and out comes a armed guard saying i need to turn around immediately i asked where i was and the reply was your in the wrong place. i finally find the on ramp and headed back north on the i-5n getting off in yreka to get some gas when i get off the freeway and start driving toward a gas station i noticed there were no cars or people for that matter except one bp gas station. i pull in to the station and there are two guys inside and of course kym is crying as the two guys watch from inside so i get out and go inside and the first that comes out of there mouth is what is wrong with the lady in the care i explained her father had passed away yesterday and we our driving to the funeral in portland oregon. these were the only people i seen in this town and i had a bad feeling inside my gut as this guy was looking at me with these piercing eyes i swear his eyes were all black and all i could think of is getting out of there. i get back on the freeway and as we started up the siskiyou mountain and again kym was shaken to the core she was sure we were going to die in some crash and not more then 5 minutes later we come around the corner there is a tanker that was jacked knife in the middle of the road blocking all the lanes kym is screaming at me not to stop so i gun it and squeeze by the tractor and concrete medium as i'm driving away i see all the guys that were working on the truck start to pick everything up as if it was staged and they were waiting for us. at this time i'm on edge now with everything that has happened up to that point just seemed like i was in some syfy movie or i was dreaming this though that was not the case at all now we our getting close to the top of the mountain just before the last exit before going down the mountain. i was getting ready to pull over on to the side of the road when i noticed that there was bright lights coming from just over the hill so i continued to drive and when we got to the top there is an exit there that will bring you around a tunnel that goes under the freeway and there was all these people in suits like you would see when there is a chemical spill or something along those lines and kym said turn it around they are cloning people we can't go through the tunnel and at this point i'm believing what she is telling me so what i do i turn the car around and drive down the mountain on the wrong side of the road dodging any vehicles coming up the mountain. i get down the mountain to exit 1 and turn the car around and park it along the road i tell kym grab the water and blanket were our going to hike up the mountain to hide tell i see day light so we get half way up the hill side and hide behind some bushes to relax and take a break not more then a couple of minutes this truck( i say a truck though i'm not sure what it was it did not look real at all) pulled up and then out comes 8 to 10 people in the suites jump out and start canvassing the area where we were parked kym was ready to give up her life and at that moment i grabbed her and covered her mouth tell they left witch seemed like for ever. i let go of kym and she is calmed down a little since the suites took off i look up in the sky and all i could see was what looked like a circle of stars just hovering there you could not see anything else other then the circle of stars and on top of that it was snowing though it really wasn't snow it looked like it as it was falling and yet when you look at it on your skin it felt like ash i thought for of minute maybe there was an eruption or something that would explain some of the things that were going that night. kym kept on telling me that we were not on the earth we lived on that this was the 7th earth in the circle of life we sat there going over everything that had happened up to that time. i don't remember what time it was though it seemed like we were up in the hills for a long time waiting for light of day to come finally it comes we get back on the road. now as i'm driving every time a vehicle was approaching i would have to pull off the side of the road an wait tell the truck got passed us before moving on. we get down the mountain in one piece so i pull off to get some gas in ashland and as the guy was pumping some gas i asked if anyone had died on the mountain last night and to my surprise he said yes a couple crashed last night. we finally make it home and at that night before we went to bed there were 3 beings of some sort you could see the outline of all 3 of them the next day kym an i split up she tells me that i am a constant reminder of what had happen to us. we both remember being in a room on a table that was like metal though it wasn't anything i had ever seen she said she could see them working on my head though she couldn't see what they were doing exactly. i kept what had happened to me for years before telling anyone and on top of that i tracked kym down after 15 years asking if she remembered what happen that day and she said i remember everything exactly the way it happened. i missed a few things though this gives you an accurate account of what happened.           

thanks james 

p.S i member the night has if it happened yesterday it does not go away...
content.summary: Started in willow ca and went all the way up the siskiyou mt loss of 3 plus hrs with scares

content.detailedDescription: Outside at 2120 pst, checking out the moon, jupiter, and mars then noticed a "star" moving, but slowly.  at first thought it was a satellite, however, was too low.  no aircraft's in site of this area.  the object moved (from where i first saw, nw) towards se, then dimmed out and gone.  lasted for approx 2 minutes, object moving in a straight line, total time approx. 2:30 minutes.  i have emailed my video of the object seen to the mufon investigator in az (the person i spoke with last time i saw something.)  my wife was with me, however, she isn't a believer as myself, but did see it.
content.summary: Bright light, no sound, not a satellite

content.detailedDescription: my friend and i were sitting on a beach at night star gazing. we noticed two lights that appeared to be an airplane. the lights were moving in a straight line towards us and got close enough where we should of heard the sound of an airplanes engine, but, it was silent. all of a sudden the lights took a left rather quickly for a few seconds. the then it took an erratic right, went across the sky and appeared to go down in the next town over. all without making a sound. we thought it was definitely a ufo, so we went back to my house and told my mother. she called the branford police department and they said, they got reports from other people on the incident and that's the last i heard about it
content.summary: Lights  appear to move to erratic to be an airplane.

content.detailedDescription: 3 red round objects came out from the east going west one went south 1 to the east and started shooting multan lad in the middle of the lobject  towards the ground and i took pictures you have to see these pictures  then the next night i went out to see if they're back again and they were to the south or to the north doing the same thing shootin molten lad at the ground to the north of us.
content.summary: Three round objectsred.Red and black shootin molten lad at the ground.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my garage when i notice a blue light shining through some pecan trees in front of my house. it caught my attention because there's nothing over their that could be making a glow of light. at first i thought someone was playing a trick with a laser light but there's nothing behind those pecan trees and no houses for miles. as i stood there and watch this blue light for about five to seven mins, i still wasn't convince that someone was doing this until i started to walk toward this light from my garage and the blue light moved further back but as i backed up it came back to its original position. i then stood there for a few moments really wondering what is this so i move two steps to the right and the blue light did the exact same thing i then move to the left two steps again it moved. when i move back to where i first was, so did the light but then after that it move up to the top of the trees slowly and moved backed down level with me. so at this point i'm almost convince that this is not someone playing so i did a series of movement from forward to back and side to side and the light follow as i was making it move by this time my mind is racing and heart is beating a little faster. so i took my phone and started to video it as close as i could zoom in to the light and for the next 30 mins the light did movement from up and down to side to side and finally just disappeared i really didn't know what to make of it then and till this day i still don't but, i do have it all on video.
content.summary: Strange blue light

content.detailedDescription: I live in a cul de sac of a small development. i had been invited over to  a friend's house that night at about 10:00pm. leaving my house about 10:30pm, i had looked up at the sky once i had gotten to the door on driver's side of my car like i normally do. after seeing an unidentified object in my development with my father and brother it has become a habit to look up at the night's sky. i had looked over my neighbor across the street's house and had this time seen a glowing  light. i had noticed the object in the sky since it was much brighter and larger than the stars in the sky, it also had a yellow tint to it. i shrugged it off, assuming it was a planet, considering ever since i was a child my dad would point out the lights in the sky and show me which were planets, so i assumed it was venus. i'd got in my car and drove for about two minutes. i started to feel uneasy and had started to get a stomach ache so i decided to turn around and go home. when i had gotten back to my house, i stood outside the driver's door again, the same spot as before, and looked back up at the sky. the light was not in the same spot that it was when i left. it had moved up and more to the right, it was now over one of my other neighbor's houses. i was terrified and ran inside, feeling full of nothing but utter fear. i regret not staying outside and taking pictures. the day after the sighting i had seen two black unmarked chinook helicopters, one over my development and the other over the other side of my city. i had also heard a helicopter fly very closely over my house on june 18th, though i was unable to  get a look at it. i am aware that there are medical helicopters in my area but never has one flown directly over my house as it had the night of june 18th. it was very low and loud.
content.summary: Unidentified bright orb hovering above neighbors' house later observed northwest of pervious position
